name: Home Behind
description: In Home Behind, you take on the role of a refugee cast out from your homeland by a band of rebels. Your home and the peace you enjoyed has been destroyed, and your family has disappeared. Can you survive the struggle, famine, and sickness to make it to the safety of Europe?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Great game! Interesting themes! We want english version!  (我是中国人XD)

the game has a ♥♥♥♥in potential but glitches ruin the whole experience. notably the carrying capacity that is overglitched . the number that you carry doesn't decrease accordingly when you consume items in crafting or even eating. and i'll pass over things that just render this game barely playable at the moment.  I'M WAITING FOR A MAJOR GLITCH UPDATE BEFORE REPLAYING THIS HALF FINISHED STUFF !!!
